TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputHidden extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class HtmlInputHidden Inherits HtmlInputControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler
type HtmlInputHidden = class inherit HtmlInputControl interface IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 可以使用控件隐藏的中的用户的信息嵌入`
`元素。You can use the control to embed information that is hidden from the user within a `` element. Web 页面回发到服务器时发送此信息。This information is sent when the Web page is posted back to the server. 控件提供了是事件时引发属性发生更改的各次发送到服务器的值。The control provides a event that is raised when the property changes values between posts to the server. 这允许你创建的事件处理程序执行每次引发事件的一组自定义的说明。This allows you to create an event handler that performs a custom set of instructions each time the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 控件不提供回发到服务器的内置方法。The control does not provide a built-in way to post back to the server. 必须提供另一个控件在网页上支持发布到服务器，如控件，该控件的值发送回服务器。You must provide another control on the Web page that supports posting to the server, such as an control, to send the value of the control back to the server. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 页面框架使用此 HTML 功能来自动加载和保持页面上的服务器控件的视图状态。The ASP.NET page framework uses this HTML feature to automatically load and persist the view state of server controls on a page. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件在网页上的各次发送到服务器存储的信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control to store information on the Web page between posts to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputHidden Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputHidden Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputHidden Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputHidden Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"隐藏"的文本字符串。The "hidden" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的新实例控件并将它放置在网页上。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the control and place it on the Web page. summary.span: 处理 控件的回发数据。

span.span: Processes the postback data for the control.

returns.span: 如果 控件的状态已因回发而更改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检查以查看是否的回发值控件是不同于以前的值，如果是这样，则返回`true`。The method checks to see whether the postback value of the control is different from the previous value, and if so, returns `true`. 方法主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就在呈现之前调用方法控件。The method is called just prior to rendering the control. 方法主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，使其应用到输入值在自定义 HTML 编码服务器控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it applies HTML encoding to the input value in a custom server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputhidden_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputhidden_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputhidden_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputhidden_onprerender.vb#2)]

span.span: A that contains event data.
Raises the event.

summary.span: 该方法使您可以直接处理该事件。

span.span: This method allows you to handle the event directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时在服务器上更改属性。The event is raised when the property is changed on the server. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须具有启用视图状态事件才能正常工作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员若要扩展的功能控件。The method is used primarily by control developers to extend the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 在服务器上更改 属性时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property is changed on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时属性更改的各次发送到服务器。The event is raised when the property is changed between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须具有启用视图状态事件才能正常工作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
